Home.title: Welcome to geti website
Home.geti, short for golden east for trade &: Geti, short for Golden East for Trade & Industry LLC.
Home.our clients consider us to be the leader: Our clients consider us to be the leaders of the premium aluminum finishing industry in Egypt.
Home.this is due to geti's superior standards: This is due to Geti's superior standards for quality and reliability.
Home.golden east is a limited liability compa: Golden East is a limited liability company based in Cairo, Egypt.
Home.we offer a range of high-quality aluminu: We offer a range of high-quality aluminum manufacturing and finishing solutions for house appliances, shower enclosures, LED lighting and much more.
Home.our products are all over the market and: Our products are all over the market and we're proud to be the leaders of the anodizing industry in Egypt.
Home.our products can be found over a wide ra: Our products can be found over a wide range of home appliances from kitchen stoves to refrigerators and microwaves

About.geti abbreviation: GETI is abbreviation for "Golden East for Trade and Industry"
About.our clients consider us: Our clients consider us to be the leaders of the premium aluminum finishing industry in Egypt. This is due to Geti's superior standards for quality and reliability
About.golden east is llc: Golden East is a private limited liability company LLC based in Cairo, Egypt
About.we offer a range: We offer a range of high-quality aluminum manufacturing and finishing solutions for house appliances, shower enclosures, furniture, LED lighting and much more
About.mission paragraph: We will keep developing and innovating to find and satisfy new applications for our products, sustaining the market of Aluminum profiles in Egypt and we shall maintain and improve our quality and credibility in order to attract new businesses to collaborate with us, either locally or globally
About.vision paragraph: To completely cover the market shortage for premium aluminum profiles and eliminate the need to import aluminum profiles into Egypt Then to expand into different countries and continents to prove that the Egyptian industry is more than capable of providing premium products in all industries
About.quality paragraph: We uphold the highest global standards and keep pushing the bar further and further
About.commitment paragraph: Staying true to our standards and deadlines as well as upholding the intellectual property of our clients
About.learning paragraph: Nobody knows everything. Successful businesses are built on a foundation of humility and ongoing learning, we follow suit
About.development paragraph: Weâ€™re always working on the development of production processes and quality standards
